alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 9:59AM CDT until June 05 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 959 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Norman, or near Stanley Draper Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Norman, Pink, Tribbey, Etowah, Macomb, Stella, Lake Thunderbird and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
